The fix caused deadlock if decorations are removed synchronously on the UI thread.  I am not sure that we want to force clients to remove decorations asynchronously.

Changed in DecorationManager #removeDecorations methods.  I synchronized the part where decorations are removed from fDecorations.  Decoration#remove is called outside the synchronized block.  This will allow clients to remove the decoration both synchronously and asynchronously.
Re-opening, this incorrectly removes all decorations from a target when a thread is resumed. Not correct when mutliple threads are suspended.
